Highlight.summary: The Highlight interface of the CSS Custom Highlight API is used to represent a collection of instances to be styled using the API.

remarks.para: To style arbitrary ranges in a page, instantiate a new Highlight object, add one or more Range objects to it, and register it using the .
A Highlight instance is a Set-like object that can hold one or more Range objects.
